segments.text: What made you decide on this type of occupation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , to tell you the truth , I love the sky . When I was a child , I imagined flying into the blue sky some day . Now , I think the day has come . My dream will come true . And I like travelling very much and I enjoy working with people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you make yourself understood in English without too much difficulty ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think I am quite fluent in English . I got the certificate of the Secondary English Training last month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know what the responsibilities are for a stewardess ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The main responsibility of the stewardess is to make the passengers relaxed and happy during the flight . And good service is also important .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just had a complete physical examination and I am in top condition .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you had any nursing experience ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have two years of nursing experience , and now I am working as a nurse in a hospital .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How tall are you ? What about your eyesight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My height is one meter and sixty-eight centimeters . I've never had any vision problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would you say are your strengths and weaknesses ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One of my strengths is my friendliness and open-minded attitude and also I think I have a warm personality . But sometimes , I find it is hard to tell others when I don't like what they are doing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If a passenger can't understand what you say , what should you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll try to speak in another language or I'll try my best to use gestures and draw pictures .
segments.speaker: S2
